page.title: 02THE NEW VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Village has been raising money for a new Village Hall for 7 years.The cost of the new Village Hall is Â£66,000.At the moment the community have raised around Â£25,000.The council have decided to pay 25 percent of the money.The Village Hall was demolished because it was dangerous.At one of the dances one of the walls moved 6 inches.Mike Joyce the chairman of the community is hoping that they can get the new Village Hall built and opened by September.Underneath the site for the new Village Hall there was an area of clay which is thought to have been the remains of the mining operations which were carried out in the last century.
